segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s talk a bit about your health situation. Can you tell me, like, how do you feel generally? Any concerns or, um, ongoing conditions?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, um, I've been okay, I guess. No major issues, but I do smoke. I mean, I’ve been smoking since, like, I was 18, and probably around a pack a day, or maybe a bit less. So, um, I don't really have any long-term care needs now but, uh, I know I might need help down the road if things don’t go so well. And I do have a will, but it’s kinda old. I should probably update it, right?
